title: Cards being compromised
text: Cards are being compromised. Online identity theft

title: Okay
text: Love the idea of the app. It’s pretty cool that you can get a medal card for a fee per month. I know it’s not cheap to make so I get it. I can’t use this card with certain things and I don’t like that. The card registers as a prepaid card so it doesn’t work as an option for a lot of payment methods. Wished this wasn’t the case. Such a premium looking card but unfortunately can’t be used as such.

title: Security
text: Giving one of my exceptionally rare reviews simply to say that Revolut has some feature for flagging when you may be getting scammed, and they saved me from losing €1300 that I don’t have to spare right now. Earned significant customer loyalty from me for that.

title: Love
text: This app is awesome. I love it it’s fantastic you just don’t know.

title: doesn’t have iraq.
text: don’t know how good the app is because it doesn’t have iraq number and it doesn’t support it and for the identity verification too plz add it so we can use it too i’ve tried multiple times to verify my identity with my passport and it doesn’t work plz add support for iraq.

title: Fantastic
text:
One of the best app I ever used 
Keep it up.

title: Unusable app
text:
Best app ever! First time sending an international payment and no fees :)

PLEASE STOP HIDING BALANCE ON IPHONE SHAKE ITS SOOOO ANNOYING

title: A request
text: Can you add Iraq please would be Useful for me as a student!?

title: Revolute, the most convenient
text: Revolut has been the mos convenient for me. It won’t charge you for money transfer. Absolutely user friendly. The help center, especially live agents are really efficient and helpful. I am absolutely satisfied.

title: It is amazing
text: I use every day it so easy and functional. The best bank ever!

title: Amazing app
text: Honestly the app and the service itself are both fantastic, and the app is so much better than those of all the legacy banks. It feels more like a tech company than a bank.

title: Plaid support
text: Hi, I use several banks and I use Copilot app for budgeting and expense tracking. All banks could be connected through the Plaid, but I did not find Revolut in that list, can you please add support for that?

title: I take back my rude review
Hello
text: I love it so much thanks

title: Account creation from Ghana
text: The app looks good with impressive reviews however when I tried to create an account from Ghana the country could not be found even though I noticed there were other African countries in the list.
